title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Fragment of heavy hand-woven linen in a dark cream color block printed in black. Design is mostly reserved in background color with details in black. Curving vine and stylized flowers forming an allover pattern. Block mark shows across center of piece.

Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1954-54-4.
